They have 14 branches and 230 dealers in all over India. with average sales revenue 10 billion.

as a Branch (from 18th Feb'15) Key Responsibility: Finalisation Of Accounts (Branch), customer dealing.

to

Company Name
Kolkata & Hyderabad | Finance Executive Erstwhile Coates of India Limited established in 1937, DIC India Limited is a subsidiary of Japan based Dainippon Ink & Chemicals.
DIC India along with its subsidiaries sells and produces printing inks.
The products include black ink, print finish ink, offset ink, screen and liquid printing inks.
It also produces synthetic resins, polyurethane lamination adhesives, press room chemicals & rubber blankets.
A wide array of UV lacquers is marketed under the Viocure brand name.
Key Responsibilities: All debtors management (Region wise) .Finalisation Of Accounts (Eastern region), customer dealing.

to

Company Name
A leading manufacturer of flameproof equipment in the country.
This company having a joint venture with SAIT Mining of France is engaged in manufacturing of Transwitch Unit, NFLP Starter, Halogen Bulbs widely used in Mining Sector.
The company has installed vast and exhaustive range of the flameproof mining equipment in the Indian coal mines.
These range from Lighting transformers, drill panels, field switches, to boltless gate end boxes.
Over 3000 flameproof air circuit breakers are in operation on an all India basis.
Functional Role: Finalisation Of Accounts, Debtors and Creditors Management, Cash Flow Statement, Central Sales Tax as well as Vat tax return submission, sales tax assessment, Way Bill, C form, E1 form, Provident Fund, ESI, Central Excise, Bank Guarantee, Letter Of Credit, BRS Etc.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Finance Manager - Support

Location: Redmond, WA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance, Management

Description:
*** Direct Hire role with a Planned Promotion Track ****** MUST be willing to travel 50% of the time***
Are you ready to embark on a dynamic journey towards leadership excellence? We are offering an exceptional opportunity for a Finance Support Manager to kickstart their career ascent within our client's esteemed organization. This 12-month program is designed to groom you into a Business Unit Finance Manager, and then later, an Area Director.
Seize this chance to gain invaluable leadership experience and carve out a path to success with us!
Position Overview:As a Finance Support Manager, you will dive deep into the intricacies of our business operations, working closely with sales and operations teams across various sites. Your role will involve a blend of travel, financial forecasting, and month-end closings, contributing directly to the success of our $1.5 billion region.
Responsibilities:Participate in a 12mo leadership development program designed to guide you to a Business Unit Finance Manager, and then later, an Area Director positionImmerse yourself in understanding the operations and nuances of our businessCollaborate with sales and operations teams across different sites, engaging in hands-on learning experiencesSpend ~1 week out of each month forecasting sessionsSpend ~2 weeks out of each month traveling to field sitesUtilize the remaining time on month end close
Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree in a related field, an MBA is a plus2+ years of Finance and Accounting experienceDemonstrated ambition to assume leadership roles and grow within the companyGeographical mobility is essential; willingness to relocate to one of several nationwide locations for the Business Unit Finance Manager position-No prior management experience needed
Pay:$135,000 /year
Location:HYBRID, 4 days in office, 1 day at home50% travel to regional locations
------------
TalentBridge -- Connecting People with Their Purpose
As one of the nation’s leading professional recruiting companies, TalentBridge successfully places thousands of candidates in their dream jobs every year.
At TalentBridge, we’re passionate about connecting people with their purpose, and we go above and beyond to be the trusted partner to the people we serve. We value relationships over transactions – relationships grounded in open communication and honesty. We’re built on collaboration and teamwork — both with internal team members and with each and every candidate we represent. And that goes beyond a vested interest in your professional success, to rooting for your personal success.
We’re not just another staffing company churning and burning our way through candidates. Our seasoned recruiting professionals love what they do – the Charlotte Observer named us a Top Workplace two years running – and they’re great at it!
We know success begins with personal connections, so we work hard every day to get to know the person behind the resume so we can help our candidates find the best job, not just a job.That’s a fantastic reason to get out of bed every morning, and we’re excited to share it with an expanding team. Will you join us?
Proven Process
We follow a disciplined, proven process to help ensure success in matching high-quality candidates with high-performance companies. It starts with an in-depth understanding of your skills and experience. It continues with a deep dive into your passions which, in turn, help us to find your purpose. It’s a process that goes well beyond your resume – one that values relationships over transactions in order to optimize success in your job search.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
